sentences.en: a course in graphic design
sentences.cn: 平面设计课程

sentences.en: a floral design
sentences.cn: 花卉图案

sentences.en: Centre the design on the cloth before you start.
sentences.cn: 在开始前，将图案放在布的正中间。

sentences.en: computer-aided design
sentences.cn: 计算机辅助设计

sentences.en: He approached me to create and design the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他请我建造并设计该饭店。

sentences.en: He has some grand designs for the company.
sentences.cn: 他对公司发展有一些宏图大计。

sentences.en: he suspected her of having designs on the family fortune.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑她在对这笔家产打主意。

sentences.en: His design was infinitely better than anything I could have done.
sentences.cn: 他的设计比我所能设计出的不知要好上多少倍。

sentences.en: I became a presenter by default rather than by design.
sentences.cn: 我成为主持人是因为当时我未考虑其他选择就接受了，并非我刻意要求得此职。

sentences.en: Most have slavishly copied the design of IBM'sbig mainframe machines.
sentences.cn: 大多数公司都一味模仿IBM公司大型主机的设计。

sentences.en: Most mobile robots are still in the design stage.
sentences.cn: 大多数移动机器人仍处在设计阶段。

sentences.en: The book is designed as a reference manual.
sentences.cn: 这本书是作为参考手册设计的。

sentences.en: the design for the new sports centre
sentences.cn: 新体育中心的设计图

sentences.en: the design process
sentences.cn: 设计过程

sentences.en: the design team
sentences.cn: 设计团队

sentences.en: The grand design of Europe's monetary union is already agreed.
sentences.cn: 欧洲统一货币的宏伟构想已经获得认同。

sentences.en: The new plane is in its final design stage.
sentences.cn: 这种新型飞机正处于最后的设计阶段。

sentences.en: The ridged design of the pan allows excess fat to drain off.
sentences.cn: 平底锅的凸纹设计使多余的油能够控出。

sentences.en: The shoes were of good design and good quality.
sentences.cn: 这些鞋样式新颖，质量上乘。

sentences.en: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.cn: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

sentences.en: Their range of tableware is decorated with a blackberry design.
sentences.cn: 他们的整套餐具上都饰有黑莓图案。

sentences.en: These machines are constantly updated by improving the design of the computers.
sentences.cn: 通过改善计算机的设计，这些机器不断得到更新。

sentences.en: They do, however, share a mutual interest in design.
sentences.cn: 不过他们确实都对设计感兴趣。

sentences.en: They drew up the design for the house in a week.
sentences.cn: 他们在一周内就画出了房子的图样。

sentences.en: This design knocks everything else into a cocked hat.
sentences.cn: 这一设计令其他作品相形见绌。

sentences.en: This new design will offer undreamed-of levels of comfort, safety and speed.
sentences.cn: 这种新设计将会给您带来意想不到的舒适、安全和快捷。

sentences.en: Various textile techniques will be explored to realise design possibilities.
sentences.cn: 将尝试和探索纺织技巧来把这些设计变为现实。

words.tran_cn: 有计划的，原意的；故意的
由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的

phrases.tran_cn: 设计过程，设计程序；设计加工
（多指以不正当手段）图谋获得，对…有企图；觊觎
室内设计；室内装饰；内部装饰业
景观设计；园林设计；环境景观设计

trans.tran_cn: 设计，安排，设计艺术，构思，设计图，花纹，打算，计划
trans.tran_en: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like
the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like
the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

trans.tran_cn: 设计，制图，构思，计划，制定，制造
trans.tran_en: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built
to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built
